text: Kim Sung-hye (Korean: 김성혜; born 6 January 1968) is a South Korean former judoka. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the half-middleweight event. At the 1990 Asian Games she won the bronze medal in the –61 kg category. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Judoka Category:Living people Category:South Korean martial artists
title: Kim Sung-hye
